name: Mega Evolution
flavor: Take yourself a step further and surpass what you once thought even possible!
text:
- Mega Evolution requires a Mega Stone as a held item and spending 2 will points at Initiative.
- Only one character can Mega Evolve per quest or spar.
- Characters using Mega Evolution cannot use Z-Moves in the same quest or spar.
- Mega Stones are equipped for the entire quest or spar and cannot be unequipped, stolen, or made inaccessible.
- You cannot Mega Evolve while under Terastallization, and vice versa.
- Mega Evolution swaps to the Mega stat block and changes ability and typing until you revert, which happens at the end of a scene or by choice during initiative.
